title: Enhancing Clinical Competency: Immersive VR-Based Multilingual Science Concept Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific terminology comprehension and VR device usage experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain scientific concepts in three languages (Korean, English, Chinese) in VR environments
Learners can analyze complex scientific phenomena through multilingual metalinguistic awareness using interactive VR simulations
Learners can propose science problem-solving strategies through multilingual discussions with peers in VR-based collaborative activities
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
